name: Bonnie the Bunny
description:
Help Bonnie collect as many carrots as possible while avoiding the dangerous creatures out to get her!

--------------------------------

Controls:

A/Left Arrow - Move Left
D/Right Arrow - Move Right
S/Down Arrow - Crouch
Space - Jump
P/Esc - Pause
Enter - Select

--------------------------------

Collectables:
Carrot: 50 Points
Golden Carrot: 10 Points
Bonus Letter: 100 Points
Heart Crystal: 250 Points, and recover one heart

--------------------------------

Tips:

Bonnie can jump up through wooden platforms, and by pressing
Crouch + Jump while standing on one, she can drop through them.
Use these techniques to get around the screen quickly!

A Bonus Letter will appear when Bonnie collects 10 Carrots without
missing one or taking damage. Something good happens if you get all 5...

A Heart Crystal appears every 10000 Points. Collect them to replenish
one of Bonnies hearts!

The Combo Bar at the top left fills every time a Carrot is collected.
Your points will be mulitiplied by the amount shown, so collect Carrots
as fast as possible to increase it and keep it filled!

As the game goes on, enemies will spawn faster, and harder versions of
them will appear. Also Carrots will disappear faster.
